cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Slate for India,. XSth June 1919.(Received 11 p.m.) 8815. 28th June. No. 48. '1. Baluchistan reports definite information received that small force of Afghan infantry crossed the British territory west Kamarudin Karez during period 20th June-22nd June inclusive. This force now back in Afghan territory.2. No other change to report.3. On Dakka front cavalry reconnaissance on 27th reported hill south and west of G-irdi and sangar east of Girdi to be strongly held.4. Patrol encounter reported from Peiwar.No Press communique issuing.'
